entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:33 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 37.
